apollo.datasets.nam.open_range¶

apollo.datasets.nam.open_range(start='2017-01-01', stop='today', **kwargs)[source]¶

Load and combine forecasts for a range of reference times.

NOTE: This method only loads data from the cache.

Parameters:
  • start (numpy.datetime64 or str) – The first time in the range. The default is 2017-01-01T00:00
  • stop (numpy.datetime64 or str) – The last time in the range. The default is the start of the current day.
Returns:

xarray.Dataset – Returns a single dataset containing all forecasts at the given reference times. Some data may be dropped when combining forecasts.
